soen6441.kingdoms.core
Interface MoveContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameState
public interface MoveContext

Abstracting game state information available for a player before performing a move and action available to a player when perform a move

Method Summary

          Obtain the current board state
 int getNumPlayers()
          This statistic is used to help in the strategies definition The player gets this status to determine whether we are at the first round of the game

placePlayerTileOnBoard

boolean placePlayerTileOnBoard(int boardRow,
                               int boardCol)
Player places its own tile onto the board. It will fail if the given board location is not empty OR if player is not holding a tile

Parameters:
boardRow - The index of the row where the object should be placed
boardCol - The index of the column where the object should be placed
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

placePlayerCastleOnBoard

boolean placePlayerCastleOnBoard(java.lang.String castleType,
                                 int boardRow,
                                 int boardCol)
Player places its own castle onto the board. It will fail if the given board location is not empty OR if player does not have the given type of castle left

Parameters:
castleType - Castle type. One of Castle.RANK_X constant
boardRow - The index of the row where the object should be placed
boardCol - The index of the column where the object should be placed
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

placeTileOnBoardfromTileStack

boolean placeTileOnBoardfromTileStack(int boardRow,
                                      int boardCol)
Player picks a card from tile stack and places it onto the board. It will fail if the given board location is not empty OR can not draw from tile stack

Parameters:
boardRow - The index of the row where the object should be placed
boardCol - The index of the column where the object should be placed
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise

isLastRound

Returns:
true if it is the last round during an epoch

getNumPlayers

int getNumPlayers()
This statistic is used to help in the strategies definition The player gets this status to determine whether we are at the first round of the game

Returns:
the number of players currently playing
